LFADS.RunSpec¶

classLFADS.RunSpec(name, runClassName, datasetCollection[, datasetIndicesOrNames])[source]¶

Bases: handle, matlab.mixin.CustomDisplay

Represents a set of specifications for an LFADS experiment on a specific subset of datasets within a LFADS.DatasetCollection. RunSpec instances are used to create instances, and all runs in a collection share the same parameter settings, which are represented by a shared LFADS.RunParams instance.

Properties

runClassName = ''[source]¶

Class name that will be used to create LFADS.Run instances. Or function_handle to class constructor

name (char) = ''[source]¶

Name of this run unique within its RunCollection, will be used as subfolder on disk

comment (char) = ''[source]¶

Textual comment for convenience

version (uint32) = 2[source]¶

Internal versioning allowing for graceful evolution of path settings

Properties

datasets = None[source]¶

Array of LFADS.Dataset instances which this particular Run will utilize

datasetIndsInCollection = None[source]¶

indices of each dataset into datasetCollection.datasets

datasetCollection = None[source]¶

Dataset collection used by this run (and all runs in the same RunCollection)

Dependent Properties

DependentnDatasets = None[source]¶

Number of datasets used by this run

Methods

[run] = RunSpec(name, runClassName, datasetCollection[, datasetIndicesOrNames])[source]¶
Parameters:
  • name (string) – Unique name for this run within the collection
  • runClassName (string) – Class name that will be used to create LFADS.Run instances using
  • datasetCollection (LFADS.DatasetCollection instance) – DatasetCollection in which this run will find its datasets
  • datasetIndicesOrNames (vector of integers or cellstr) – if numeric vector, will select datasets by index in datasetCollection. If cellstr of names, will search for datasets by name within datasetCollection.
[tf] = eq()[source]¶

Overloaded == operator to enable equality if name, datasetCollection, and datasets all match

selectDatasets(datasetIndicesOrNames)[source]¶
Parameters:datasetIndicesOrNames (vector of integers or cellstr) – if numeric vector, will select datasets by index in datasetCollection. If cellstr of names, will search for datasets by name within datasetCollection.
selectDatasetsByIndex()[source]¶

Specify the datasets that this Run should use from the set of datasets in its DatasetCollection by indices

Parameters:idx (logical mask or indices) – Selection applied to this run’s DatasetCollection’s array of datasets
selectDatasetsByName()[source]¶

Specify the datasets that this Run should use from the set of datasets in its DatasetCollection using name matching

Parameters:names (string or cellstr) – Name or names to search for within this run’s DatasetCollection’s array of datasets
[text] = generateSummaryText()[source]¶

Generate a string representation of this Run Spec’s info

Returns:string
Return type:text
